price: 45. Toysa ken cab Nabiyow ken ayróy (woh Qhiyaamah ayró) edde finqitoonu waanat ongoorowwu iyyaanam fanah.
arabic: فَذَرۡهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُواْ يَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي فِيهِ يُصۡعَقُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fadharhum ḥattā yulāqū yawmahumu alladhī fīhi yuṣ'ʿaqūna
